title: Azure utvecklare med erfarenhet till AMF
description:
**Har du några års erfarenhet av Azure-utveckling och vill utvecklas i en spännande roll? AMF söker nu en erfaren Azure-utvecklare med intresse för applikations- och plattformsutveckling. Detta är en möjlighet för dig med 2–4 års erfarenhet att ta nästa steg i karriären och bli en nyckelspelare i ett av Sveriges ledande pensionsbolag.**
**Om rollen:**
 Som Azure-utvecklare på AMF blir du en viktig del av teamet som ansvarar för att systemstöd håller hög kvalitet och driftsäkerhet. Du arbetar med utveckling i produktion och test, och dina arbetsuppgifter inkluderar:
   

  

* Ständiga förbättringar av systemlösningar.
* Utveckling av nya gränssnitt och plattformsfunktioner i Azure.
* Konfigurering och utveckling av stödsystem kring våra systemlösningar.
* Omvärldsbevakning av nya tekniker och tekniska lösningar.
* Samarbete i tvärfunktionella team och deltagande i kompetensgruppen för systemutveckling.


**Vi erbjuder dig:**
* En roll med ansvar för affärskritiska och centrala system.
* Spännande och utmanande utvecklingsuppgifter mellan försäkringssystemen och interna system.
* En kultur som prioriterar lärande, kunskapsdelning och personlig utveckling.
* Ett positivt samarbetsklimat präglat av innovation och nyfikenhet.


**Ditt team och arbetsplats:**
 Du tillhör avdelningen IT-plattform och arbetar i tvärfunktionella team enligt agila metoder (SAFE). AMF:s kontor ligger centralt i Stockholm nära T-centralen.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som:**
* Har en akademisk examen eller motsvarande samt 2–4 års erfarenhet av systemutveckling i Azure.
* Har ett stort tekniskt intresse och är nyfiken på att lära dig nya programmeringsspråk.


**Kompetens inom:**
* Microsoft Azure
* Java
* SQL
* XML
* Webservices
* API:er
* GitHub Copilot
* Agila metoder


 Meriterande är erfarenhet av IBM integrationsplattform IBM ACE (ESQL och Java).
   

  

**Att jobba som Azure-utvecklare på AMF:**
 Hos AMF arbetar du i en stabil organisation med starkt fokus på innovation och kvalitet. Du ingår i ett team där samarbete och utveckling står i centrum. AMF erbjuder en modern arbetsmiljö, balans mellan arbete och fritid samt möjlighet att påverka och växa i din roll.
   

  

**Rollen är placerad i Stockholm.**
**Att vara konsult på Nexer Tech Talent:**
 Nexer Tech Talent är specialister på att hjälpa techprofessionella att ta nästa steg i karriären. För denna roll blir du anställd av Nexer Tech Talent och arbetar på AMF i Stockholm med start enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

 Du får tillgång till stöd från en mentor på AMF och en konsultchef på Nexer Tech Talent. Vi anordnar regelbundet aktiviteter som föreläsningar, afterwork och lunchträffar. Efter ett framgångsrikt uppdrag på 12 månader är intentionen att du erbjuds en anställning hos AMF.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Låter detta som något för dig? Vi arbetar löpande med rekryteringen, så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Vid frågor, kontakta Tech Recruiter Olivia Holm på olivia.holm@nexergroup.com.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

**Om Nexer Group**
 Nexer Tech Talent är en del av Nexer Group – ett techbolag med djupa rötter i svenskt entreprenörskap och innovation. Tillsammans är vi över 2500 medarbetare i 15 länder som i mer än 35 år hjälpt våra kunder att ligga steget före både strategiskt, teknologiskt och kommunikativt. Läs mer om Nexer här.
   

  

**Om AMF:**
 AMF är ett av Sveriges ledande pensionsbolag och erbjuder trygga, enkla och prisvärda pensionslösningar. Läs mer om AMF här.

title: CoE Cloud Business Development Lead
job_function: Business Development, Sales, and Information Technology
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Business Consulting and Services, and IT System Custom Software Development
description:
Are you a visionary Business Developer with cloud expertise, strategic thinking, and a passion for business and sales? Do you thrive on helping clients achieve cloud-enabled business transformations?
   

  

 Join our Nordic Cloud & Custom Application (CoE) as a Cloud & DevSecOps Business Developer in Stockholm, where you will collaborate with colleagues across the Nordics and partners to address client challenges and drive business growth with sustainable solutions, including GenAI. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.
   

  

**YOUR ROLE**
 You will engage with clients across various industries within the Nordic together with your COE colleagues. Your role involves leveraging Capgemini's comprehensive solution portfolio to devise innovative, sustainable solutions tailored to client needs. You will proactively or reactively identify client challenges, create effective solutions, and communicate the value and differentiation Capgemini offers.
   

  

* Collaborate with the sales team to identify potential clients and understand their technical and business needs.
* Engage clients collaboratively to build trust and understand how Capgemini can assist them.
* Develop compelling, cost-effective solutions that exceed client expectations.
* Provide technical and sector-specific guidance throughout the sales process.
* Develop and implement strategic plans for the successful adoption of Capgemini Portfolio Solutions, including AWS, Microsoft, and GCP clouds.
* Stay updated on Capgemini’s portfolio, industry trends, and technologies.
* Participate in industry events to share knowledge and network with customers and partners.
* Collaborate with internal stakeholders to shape proposals and coordinate inputs across business lines and technical practices.
* Drive business growth within Application Modernization, Cloud Native and DevSecOps.


**YOUR PROFILE**
 We are looking for candidates who meet the following criteria’s:
   

  

* Experience navigating large, matrixed Service Provider/GSI organizations.
* Minimum of 5 years in technical presales, solution architecture, or related roles.
* Expertise in transformation/change and solution development.
* Excellent communication skills for both technical and non-technical audiences.
* Proven ability to deliver compelling technical demonstrations and presentations.
* Hands on experience in at least one Hyperscaler (AWS, Microsoft, or GCP).
* Experience from Application Modernization, DevSecOps and cloud native solutioning.
* Understanding of GenAI and agentic solutions.
* Strong problem-solving skills to address complex technical challenges.
* Proven collaborative mindset and the ability to drive business development.
* You need to be based in Stockholm but will operate across the Nordics if required.
* Full professional proficiency in English and Swedish.


*Note: You will be required to pass through SC Security Clearance if you are successful in this recruitment process, which is a condition of undertaking the role.*
**About**
**WHAT WE BELIEVE YOU WILL ENJOY ABOUT WORKING HERE**
* International Career Opportunities: Work within a vast network of expertise across Europe, with over 6500 colleagues in the Nordic region. Benefit from a broad tech-intensive community and access to over 500 courses and certification programs.
* Open Culture: Diversity is a core value. We promote equality, support women in tech, run LGBTQ+ networks, and invest in inclusion through various initiatives and activities, including sports and arts through CapSocial.
* Innovative Projects: Engage with well-known clients, world-leading partners, and enjoy the stability of a successful organization.
* Competitive Benefits: Enjoy a competitive salary, contract pension, comprehensive insurance coverage, and numerous other benefits.
* Employee Satisfaction: Our employees appreciate our friendly culture, managerial support, focus on diversity, sustainable workload, and work-life balance.
* Join us and be part of a team that values innovation, diversity, and professional growth.


**APPLICATION**
 We review applications on a rolling basis, so don't hesitate to apply early. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fuelled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.

title: C, Golang Software Engineer working on dqlite, a Raft extension for SQLite
description:
We are hiring a software developer to focus on dqlite, our distributed SQLite database which uses our own Raft library for establishing consensus and replication. Dqlite is available as a pure C library or through a Go package that we also maintain, and we intend to provide bindings for Python and other languages.
   

  

 You will design and implement enhancements to the libraft, dqlite and go-dqlite components which we consume in MicroK8s, LXD and other projects. Work includes development in those pieces of software as well as responding to issues and user inquiries.
   

  

 This is an excellent opportunity for someone who wants to have a meaningful impact on modern computing technologies. Canonical offers a fast-paced team environment and a career full of learning and development opportunities.
   

  

***Location***
 : This is a remote position available in EMEA
   

  

 What you will focus on
   

  

* Design and implement features across dqlite
* Debug and fix issues encountered by your users
* Improve Jepsen tests, traditional HA database automated testing and stress tests
* Participate in our engineering process through code and architectural review
* Engage with the open source community and commercial partners


 What we are looking for in you
   

  

* Experience with distributed systems (preferably with Raft)
* Good C programming experience
* Solid understanding of asynchronous programming and concurrency patterns a plus
* Capacity to learn quickly about new systems and techniques
* Strong written and verbal communication skills
* Bachelor's or equivalent in Computer Science, STEM or similar degree


 What we offer you
   

  

 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Employee Assistance Programme
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world on a daily basis. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Canonical has been a remote-first company since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

 Canonical is an equal opportunity employer
   

  

 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Technical Sales Consultant (SaaS & Cloud Solutions)
description:
**Siemens Digital Industries Software** 
 is a leading provider of solutions for the design, simulation, and manufacture of products across many different industries. Formula 1 cars, skyscrapers, ships, space exploration vehicles, and many of the objects we see in our daily lives are being conceived and manufactured using our Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) software.
   

  

 We are looking for a dynamic and technically proficient Cloud Technical Sales to join our team. In this role, you will be the bridge between our customers and our innovative SaaS solutions, helping them understand how our offerings are deployed, secured, and maintained. You will play a critical role in guiding our customers through complex cloud infrastructure topics, whether they're comparing on-premises solutions with cloud-based services or evaluating different cloud deployment strategies.
   

  

 Additionally, you will take ownership of our internal cloud demonstration environments, which are vital in showcasing our product capabilities. These environments, primarily hosted on AWS, require a strong understanding of AWS services and the ability to securely integrate them with our solutions.
   

  

 Does it sound like a match?
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
**Customer Engagement & Solutions Consultation**
* Work closely with customers to explain the technical architecture and deployment strategies of our SaaS solutions.
* Guide customers in understanding security best practices, infrastructure options, and the integrations required between on-premises and cloud solutions.
* Present solutions for cloud environments hosted on various hyperscalers (AWS, Azure, GCP) and help clients understand how these services can be used to improve scalability, performance, and latency.
* Clearly communicate the benefits of cloud vs. on-premises solutions, helping customers make informed decisions based on their unique business needs.


**Technical Ownership of Cloud Demonstration Environments**
* Manage, maintain, and optimize our internal cloud demonstration environments, primarily hosted on AWS, ensuring they are always available and up to date.
* Collaborate with internal teams to continuously improve the performance, security, and scalability of our demo environments.
* Configure and install software within these environments to simulate real-world customer scenarios.


**Cloud Services Expertise**
* Deep understanding of AWS services, with the ability to architect and explain secure and scalable deployments for our solutions.
* Stay updated with the latest advancements in cloud technologies, and help customers leverage these services to drive their business forward.


**Qualifications**
* Proven experience as a Technical Sales or in a similar technical customer-facing role.
* Strong knowledge of SaaS solutions, cloud architectures, and hybrid (on-premises and cloud) integration models.
* Expertise in cloud services (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) including EC2, RDS, S3, VPC, Lambda, IAM, and best practices for securely deploying and maintaining cloud-based applications
* Ability to clearly communicate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.
* Experience with comparing on-premises and cloud-based solutions, highlighting the benefits and trade-offs of each.
* Solid understanding of security protocols and compliance requirements for cloud services.
* Hands-on experience installing, configuring, and maintaining software in cloud and on-premises environments.
* Ability to manage and maintain demonstration environments that are used for product demos and technical showcases.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, ability to build strong customer relationships.
* A collaborative attitude, able to work across different teams and departments.
* Highly organized and able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Passion for technology, cloud computing, and continuous learning.


**Nice to have**
* AWS Certified (Solutions Architect, Developer, or similar).
* Strong analytical, problem-solving, and troubleshooting skills.
* Experience in a SaaS company or with cloud-native solutions is highly desirable.


 We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
   

  

**We are Siemens**
 A collection of over 377,000 minds building the future, one day at a time in over 200 countries. We're dedicated to equality, and we welcome applications that reflect the diversity of the communities we work in. All employment decisions at Siemens are based on qualifications, merit, and business need. Bring your curiosity and creativity and help us shape tomorrow!
   

  

 We offer a comprehensive reward package which includes a competitive basic salary, bonus scheme, generous holiday allowance, pension, and private healthcare.
   

  

**Transform the everyday**

title: Industrial PhD - foundation models & sensor data
description:
Tackling real-world challenges in autonomous systems
   

  

 We hope you are a talent who has recently finished your master's program or is about to graduate in the next few months! Or maybe you have one or two years of work experience. Perhaps you are looking for a PhD position at a top university while remaining close to the industry to understand real-world problems. Please continue reading if this is you.
   

  

 The role
   

  

 Scania is developing autonomous transport solutions and has recently announced autonomous trucks for mining applications. Widening the operational design domain (ODD) from confined areas to, e.g., transportation of goods on public roads is a significant undertaking. There will always be so-called long-tail problems, scenarios that are hard, or even impossible, to foresee and test the system against. The autonomous system must therefore be so generic that it can handle such unseen scenarios in the ODD. In recent years, foundation models have shown promise in enabling generalization and reasoning and a thriving research field is investigating different applications of these models, including autonomous driving.
   

  

 One key aspect of autonomous systems is their sensing of the external environment. For autonomous vehicles, a sensor setup of, e.g., cameras, lidars, and radars is used. The sensor data must be processed in such a way that no important information is lost but it is still compressed to a manageable amount for the downstream tasks to be performed in a timely manner.
   

  

 Scania and KTH are setting up a joint project, Multi-modal Open-set Perception for Safer Autonomous Trucks (MOPS), partly funded by Vinnova, where sensor data processing for and by foundation models will be studied in the context of autonomous driving. In this project, Scania will hire one industrial PhD student who will conduct research in this area supervised by KTH and Scania.
   

  

 The PhD student will be employed by Scania CV AB, and affiliated to the Division of Robotics, Perception and Learning, KTH Royal Institute of Technology. A PhD student position constitutes normally 80% academic work and includes coursework and research. The academic supervision is done by Olov Andersson, more information about his research and research group can be found here https://www.kth.se/profile/olovand
   

  

 We are dedicated to an inclusive and diverse workplace, and you will be working alongside a diverse and talented group of developers, designers, and engineers who are committed to devising innovative solutions that redefine the way we deliver and learn.
   

  

 Job responsibilities
   

  

  

* Research, write scientific papers, write PhD thesis.
* Take academic courses required by the PhD education.
* Work with applications of foundation models and other deep learning methods.
* Support and coach product development projects in proof-of-concepts validating approaches resulting from the research.
* Tech transfer of the research results to ensure long-term benefits at Scania, taking non-technical feasibility into account.


 Your profile
   

  

  

* You hold, or will soon obtain a Master of Engineering degree (or equivalent) in applied mathematics, computer science, machine learning, robotics, or a related technical field.
* Knowledge in deep learning.
* Preferably you have written a Master´s thesis on deep learning, and have solid theoretical knowledge of foundation models, sensor data, and vehicle autonomous systems.
* Strong coding skills and the ability to demonstrate results through running software on robotic platforms.
* Fluency in English, both in writing and speech.


 If you consider this to be your dream job and feel that you have a fair share of what is mentioned above, please apply!
   

  

 Our offer
   

  

 We offer a healthy and inspiring workplace with respect for the individual, where you have great opportunities to shape your work and your future. Your personal and professional development is important, and we encourage and support it. We offer permanent relocation support for foreign applicants.
   

  

 For additional information
   

  

 Thomas Gustafsson, Scania developer and project leader of this project, E-mail: thomas.gustafsson@scania.com
   

  

 Mohammad Nazari, Scania developer and product owner, E-mail: mohammad.nazari@scania.com
   

  

 Maria Linnarsson, Scania group manager, E-mail: maria.linnarsson@scania.com
   

  

 Olov Andersson, academic supervisor at KTH, E-mail: olovand@kth.se
   

  

 Application
   

  

 Selections and interviews will take place throughout the application period. Please apply no later than 2025-01-27.
   

  

 Your application should include a CV, and degree certificate or marksheets. Instead of a cover letter, please answer the questions stated when you submit your application. A background check might be conducted for this position.

title: Head of Impact & Startup Founder (March 2025)
job_function: Information Technology, Business Development, and Strategy/Planning
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
**This ad is not for an employment, but an opportunity to build a VC-backed startup from the ground up.** 




  





**Who you are:** 




 You are a highly accomplished professional with a demonstrated track record in advancing sustainability initiatives. Your expertise lies within critical areas like renewable energy, food security, or the blue economy. Driven by a passion for positive change, you envision building a groundbreaking tech startup that disrupts the status quo and propels sustainability solutions forward.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success!



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**Ideal Candidate Profile** 



* **Domain Expertise:** 
 Possess in-depth knowledge of sustainability sectors like renewable energy, waste management, or the blue economy. You're passionate about building scalable solutions for a greener future.
* **Problem-solving Prowess:** 
 Derive satisfaction from developing innovative products that address real-world challenges.
* **Impact Driven:** 
 Fuel a burning desire to make a positive difference for both people and the planet.
* **Optional:** 
 Arrive equipped with a nascent business idea focused on a specific problem, solution, or technology.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Meet Our Nordic Success Stories:** 



* **Wingbits:** 
 Community-driven flight data; redefining air travel efficiency.
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture

title: Visitor Experience Manager
description:
Do you want to take up the position working with Visit & Guide management within the Communications department, as part of the Event Experience team? An exciting opportunity to be part of the transformation journey within Communications and shaping the future of experience-based communication!
   

  

 At Scania, we are leading the shift towards a sustainable transport system, transforming from a traditional heavy vehicle manufacturer to a provider of complete sustainable transport solutions. Our commitment to innovation and excellence is showcased through our Experience Centre.
   

  

 In Central Communications, our mission is clear: drive sustainability, customer profitability, and employee engagement, all based on the foundation of "Driving the Shift". As trusted experts in communication, we're passionate about executing our tasks with precision and purpose.
   

  

 Our experience office is the cornerstone of Scania’s event experience planning, prioritizing assignments with clear KPIs and working to ensure a seamless customer journey. Our dedicated team maximizes productivity, managing bookings, staffing showrooms, and organizing visits, events, and guided tours in production areas. Our goal is to deliver an exceptional brand experience in line with our Visitor Operating Standard.
   

  

 Your role/working area
   

  

 To ensure the continuity of our visitor operations, a constant dialogue with our contacts in the production areas is required to ensure both safety and a premium experience for our visitors. This is where you come in! As a bridge between visitor operations and daily production, your communication ensures that our Guides and Guest Coordinators are well-updated and informed of any changes that affect our visits. Your responsibilities will also include being part of our global visitor network and, in consultation with our Showroom Developer, maintaining and developing our visitor areas in production.
   

  

 Statistics and data analysis to support business decisions and reporting are part of the work, along with the responsibility for managing invoices, budgets, and purchasing agencies and materials for your area of responsibility. Previous holders of this role have also had a Master Trainer responsibility to further educate and recruit new guides to our operations, which has included, among other things, script updates etc. If you have experience in something similar, it is a merit but not a requirement as we have the opportunity to solve this in other ways.
   

  

 Work description
   

  

  

* Act as the primary contact person for PRUs (production units) regarding security issues, deviations, and production adjustments that affect our visits
* Coordinate and develop visit areas and visitor experiences
* Coordinate content creation, implementation, and improvement of information flow in our visit areas in collaboration with the Showroom Developer
* Perform data analysis to support business decisions and reporting. Develop dashboards to visualize statistics and other KPIs
* Handle invoicing and other administrative tasks related to assignments


 Your profile
   

  

  

* Experience in project management and coordination
* Strong analytical skills and accustomed to working with data and reporting tools
* Experience in financial tasks such as cost monitoring/invoicing is meritorious
* Good communication skills and accustomed to collaborating with various stakeholders
* Technical knowledge, especially in content management systems, is a plus
* Experience in conducting training and/or writing/updating scripts is advantageous
* A university degree is a plus but not required


 Scania Offers
   

  

 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
   

  

 Benefits include training at our health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. Scania also hosts events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

 For more information
   

  

 Please contact Sara Hultman, Head of Experience Centre & Experience Operations (CEN).
   

  

 08-553 743 77, sara.hultman@scania.com
   

  

 Application
   

  

 The application shall contain CV, personal letter and relevant certificates.
   

  

 Please apply as soon as possible via scania.com, latest February 2, 2025. Interviews will be initiated continuously.
   

  

 A background check might be conducted for this position.

title: Head of Sales & Startup Founder (March 2025)
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals, Software Development, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**Note: This is not for full-time employment, but an opportunity to build your own VC-backed startup.** 




  





**Who you are** 




 You are a seasoned sales professional with a proven track record of success. Your expertise extends beyond simply closing deals; you possess the vision and leadership qualities to build a company from the ground up. Whether you're driven by disrupting new markets or leveraging your skills for positive global impact, this opportunity offers you the chance to become a CEO and co-found a groundbreaking company.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Meet Our Nordic Success Stories:** 



* **Wingbits:** 
 Community-driven flight data; redefining air travel efficiency
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture

title: Frontendtung fullstackutvecklare
description:
**techlove söker utvecklare!**
 Vi är ett Stockholmbaserat företag med en stark entreprenörsanda som söker en frontendtung fullstackutvecklare.
   

  

 Som utvecklare hos techlove erbjuds du ett varierande arbete med olika typer av uppdrag som omfattar allt från enklare webbplatser till avancerade system och applikationer.
   

  

**Vad kommer du att få göra?**
* Jobba med utveckling av tjänster och applikationer, både i back- och frontend.
* Vara med att ta fram nya produkter och tjänster.
* Säkerställa att kod, test och dokumentation håller hög kvalitet.
* Ständigt leta efter nya lösningar om du stöter på patrull.
* Ha kul på jobbet.


**Person före papper**
 För att bli en del av teamet ser vi att du är driven, vågar säga vad du tycker och inte är rädd för att ta egna initiativ. Vi har högt i tak och allas åsikter tas på allvar.
   

  

 Arbetet bedrivs huvudsakligen på plats men behöver man arbeta hemifrån någon dag går det att ordna.
   

  

 Uppdragen Är Olika Men Ofta Är Det Fria Arbetstider Vilket Innebär Att Du i Stor Mån Kan Bestämma Själv När Du Vill Arbeta - Så Länge Du Klarar Av Dina Arbetsuppgifter. Vi Tror Därför Att Du Är Ansvarstagande, Strukturerad Och Trivs Med Att Planera Din Egen Tid. Då Våra Projekt Ofta Har Hög Teknisk Grad Krävs Tidigare Erfarenhet Från Utveckling Samt En Kunskap Att Förstå System Från Ett Användarperspektiv. Därför Ser Vi Gärna Att Du
   

  

* Har 4+ år erfarenhet
* Kan agera techlead
* Pratar flytande svenska och bra engelska
* Har erfarenhet av att bygga kundrelationer
* Har god kommunikation, både i skrift och tal
* Är en social kameleont och van vid många kontaktytor
* Tycker om att arbeta i team


 Vårt nätverk sträcker sig från spännande uppstickare och startups till svenska stoltheter som Klarna, Telia och Spotify.
   

  

**Tekniker Som Du Behöver Ha Professionell Erfarenhet Av**
* React.js
* Laravel
* PHP
* Docker


**Meriterande**
* Starkt meriterande är UI/UXkunskaper inom mobil- och webappsutveckling.
* WebSockets och Redis, eller liknande protokoll för eventdriven utveckling och direktkommunikation.
* DevOps. Molnplattformar AWS, Bitbucket, Azure. Terminalbaserade Unix-miljöer. Verktyg som VIM, Bash-skriptning etc. Arbete i lokal- och fjärrmiljöer.
* React Native, Vue.js, Flutter.js
* SCRUM och andra arbetsmetoder i projektteam.
* CRM- och projektledningsverktyg, t.ex. ClickUp, Monday.com, Asana, Trello, Jira
* Continious Integration/Deployment. Erfarenhet av att bygga pipelines i t.ex. Github Actions.
* DDD, SOLID och andra designprinciper.


**Transparens, Värde, Gemenskap**
 Vi står för våra ledord och vet att både anställd och kund mår bäst om vi lever som vi lär.
   

  

**Kultur**
 För oss är det viktigt att alla våra medarbetare trivs på jobbet och mår bra. Vi vill att alla ska känna den gemenskap vi har byggt upp.
   

  

**Därför Kan Du Förvänta Dig**
* Flexibla och schyssta anställningsvillkor
* Roliga events och happenings med techlovefamiljen
* Utveckling både som individ, team och företag
* TV-spel med kollegorna
* Att få vara med på en spännande expansions-resa


 Tror du att det skulle passa dig? Skicka in en ansökan till jobb@techlove.se så hör vi av oss inom kort.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Mjukvaruutvecklare inom MedTech
description:
Har du några års erfarenhet som utvecklare, och vill arbeta med datadrivna lösningar inom hälsosektorn tillsammans med oss på Cubist?
   

  

**Vi Söker Dig Som**
* Är civilingenjör inom datateknik, teknisk fysik eller teknisk matematik, eller har en M.Sc. inom motsvarande område
* Gillar mjukvaruutveckling och vill testa på livet som konsult
* Trivs i agila team och vill arbeta med utmanande problemlösning, gärna inom hälso- och sjukvårdssektorn
* Vill lära dig mer om hur man arbetar med mjukvaruutveckling i en reglerad bransch
* Vill fortsätta att utvecklas, jobba med den senaste tekniken och inspireras av smarta kunder, partners och kollegor


 Vår
 **tech-stack** 
 består bland annat av teknikerna nedan - kanske kan du något av detta redan, eller så lär vi oss tillsammans!
   

  

* Generell backendutveckling
* Programmeringsspråk såsom C#, C/C++, Python, Java
* Docker, Kubernetes
* REST, Web Messaging
* Microservices
* Databaser såsom MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
* Cloudteknologier såsom Azure, AWS och GCP
* Message brokers såsom Kafka, RabbitMQ
* Webbramverk såsom Django, ASP.NET, React.js


 Vi arbetar både med uppdrag ute hos kund och projekt i våra lokaler på Kungsbron 21 i Stockholm.
   

  

**Våra kunder**
 Ett kundexempel är
 **A3P Biomedical** 
 , som utvecklar ett nytt test för prostatacancer vid namn Stockholm3. Tillsammans med A3P utvecklar vi ett kliniskt compliant backend, där regulatoriska dokument för CE-märkning ingår.
 **ImagineCare** 
 är en annan kund, med vilka vi i tätt samarbete utvecklar en plattform för egenvård av patienter med icke-akuta problem. Läs mer om dessa exempel och några av våra andra intressanta projekt på https://www.cubist.eu/#what-we-do
   

  

**Vilka är vi?**
 Idag består teamet av ca 30 konsulter som jobbar med medicinteknisk mjukvaruutveckling och datadrivna lösningar inom hälsosektorn.
   

  

 På Cubist Är Vi Stolta Över Vår Inkluderande Företagskultur Och Vår Vision Healthier And Happier. Vi Vill Bidra Till Hälsosektorn, Så Att Vi Alla Kan Känna Oss Healthier. Genom Kompetens Och Erfarenhet Vill Vi Även Bidra Till Att Vi, Våra Kunder Och Partners i Cubists Community Kan Känna Sig Happier. Tillsammans Strävar Vi Efter Att Leva Hälsosamt, Hjälpa Varandra Och Ha Kul På Jobbet. Vi Arbetar Efter Våra Värderingar
   

  

*Humanism* 
 . Vi jobbar för långsiktiga och hållbara förändringar som kommer till nytta för människor och samhället vi lever i. Alla ska känna sig välkomna i teamet, oavsett bakgrund.
   

  

*Nytänkande* 
 . Vi utmanar gärna befintliga tankesätt och strukturer och försöker att tänka nytt för att hitta kreativa lösningar. Vi försöker leva hälsosamt och hållbart, exempelvis genom att hålla nere resandet, inte köpa onödiga saker och gärna återanvända.
   

  

*Passion* 
 . Vi brinner för att göra skillnad i samhället och för människors liv. Vi känner stolthet över att utmana oss själva med nya tekniker och tankar i strävan mot ständigt lärande. Det bygger leveransförmåga som organisation och stärker den individuella kompetensutvecklingen.
   

  

 Låter detta spännande? Hör av dig idag och berätta om dig själv och dina ambitioner!
   

  

 Välkommen till Cubist!
   

  

 https://www.cubist.eu/

title: Senior .NET Utvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Medverka i kravfångst
* Designa, utveckla och implementera mjukvarulösningar
* Utföra enhets- och integrationstester
* Arbeta med support och felsökning
* Ta fram och underhålla dokumentation


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Minst 8 års arbetslivserfarenhet av system i .NET miljö med mssql databas.
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av webb-baserade lösningar med integrationer till andra system
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av utveckling i Platina
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av GIT
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av C#/.NET Framework under de senaste 10 åren
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av MS SQL Server
* Minst 4 års arbetslivserfarenhet av Nexus under de senaste 5 åren
* Minst 4 års arbetslivserfarenhet av Jenkins under de senaste 5 åren
* Minst 4 års arbetslivserfarenhet av agilt systemutvecklingsarbete under de senaste 5 åren
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av Entity Framework (5 eller senare)
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av ActiveMQ köhantering
* Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet av Azure Devops under de senaste 2 åren


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av Angular
* Erfarenhet av arbete på större statlig myndighet eller motsvarande
* Praktisk erfarenhet av XML och XSD


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 28-01-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Tech Lead .Net
company_industry: Environmental Services, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Information Services
description:
*Vill du ta ansvar för att modernisera och vidareutveckla tekniska system som är kritiska för verksamheten? Vi söker nu en erfaren Tech Lead som vill leda arbetet med att förbättra och förlänga livslängden på våra befintliga system. Hos oss får du en viktig roll i att säkerställa stabilitet och hållbarhet för framtiden.* 
















**Din roll som Tech Lead** 




 Som Tech Lead hos oss kommer du att ansvara för att vidareutveckla och modernisera etablerade system. Fokus ligger på att skapa robusta och långsiktiga lösningar, snarare än att arbeta med helt nya teknologier. Du leder ett team av utvecklare och samarbetar tätt med andra team inom IT-avdelningen för att säkerställa att systemen uppfyller verksamhetens krav.
 



 Vår kund, som i detta fall valt att vara anonym, har kontor centralt i Stockholm.
 











**Mer om rollen:** 




  




* Vidareutveckla och modernisera äldre system för att säkerställa deras långsiktiga funktion och stabilitet.



  




* Vara med och hitta lösningar för äldre system (on-prem lösningar) för att kunna flytta dessa till cloud (i detta fallet Azure).



  




* Skapa och implementera lösningar som gör systemen mer robusta och driftsäkra.



  




* Coacha och leda ett team av utvecklare, ge dem rådgivning och stöd i deras arbete.



  




* Arbeta tätt med andra team inom IT-avdelningen för att säkerställa att systemintegrationen fungerar optimalt.



  




* Dokumentera och kommunicera tekniska lösningar och processer till olika intressenter.



  





  





**Vi erbjuder:** 




  




* En arbetsmiljö som präglas av gott samarbete.



  




* Frihet under ansvar och möjlighet att vara med och påverka.



  




* Möjlighet att arbeta med erfarna kollegor som brinner för att skapa driftsäkra system.



  




* Flexibilitet med hybridarbete, där du kan kombinera kontorsnärvaro i Stockholm med distansarbete.



  





  





  





**Vem är du?** 




 Vi tror att du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med både äldre och mer moderna system och att du är van vid att förvalta och modernisera befintliga tekniska plattformar. Du har erfarenhet av att leda utvecklingsteam och trivs i en roll där du kan kombinera tekniskt djup med teamledning.
 



  





 Du har:
 



  




* Gedigen erfarenhet av att arbeta med .NET-plattformen (exempelvis .NET Framework och .NET Core).



  




* Erfarenhet av att vidareutveckla äldre system och skapa lösningar som är långsiktiga och robusta.



  




* Erfarenhet av att flytta on-prem lösningar till moln.



  




* Förmåga att coacha och leda utvecklingsteam för att nå gemensamma mål.



  




* Djup kunskap om API:er och integrationer i både nya och befintliga system.



  





  





**Ansökan** 




 I denna annons har kunden valt att vara anonym.
 



 Urval sker löpande, så skicka in din ansökan redan idag. Har du frågor om rollen? Kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult: Linda Freij på linda.freij@houseofskills.se
