title: Nordisk Presale Cloud Native
description:
*Conoa hjälper företag att modernisera IT-infrastruktur med fokus på Kubernetes, Cloud Native, Container-teknologi, Hybrid Cloud, IaC, CI/CD, Automatisering och DevOps.*

*Linux och Open Source finns i vårt DNA, och vi utvecklas ständigt genom att dela kunskap med varandra. Vi satsar stenhårt på kompetensutveckling genom en generös utbildningsbudget, och våra medarbetare belönas för att hålla sina kunskaper i absolut framkant.*

**Om rollen**


För att ytterligare expandera vår verksamhet söker vi nu en **Presale** med uppdraget att stärka vår förmåga att sälja containerlösningar i Norden: Sverige, Finland, Norge och Danmark.


Huvuduppgiften är att stötta de lokala säljteamen i respektive land genom att driva och stänga affärer med fokus på containerplattformar som tjänst samt erbjuda konsultinsatser, utbildningar och produkter kopplade till området.


Rollen innebär en jämn fördelning av arbetet (25 %) mellan de nordiska länderna och kräver en god förståelse för att navigera och hantera de olika affärskulturerna i regionen.


Du kommer vara de lokala ländernas primära kontakt för Container och Cloud Native frågor men ha fullt stöd av hela Conoas erfarenhet och expertis.


**Dina ansvarsområden**


Målgruppen är medelstora och stora företag samt organisationer, där du kommer att spela en central roll i dialogen med nya kunder och i upphandlingar.


Vi arbetar konsultativt och ofta i en utbildande roll, eftersom Containers fortfarande är ett område med begränsad kunskap hos många kunder. Vår ambition är att bli kundens Trusted Advisor, vilket ställer höga krav på din förmåga att kommunicera, lyssna, och att förstå samt identifiera kundens behov och utmaningar.


I rollen behöver du kunna navigera både tekniska och affärsmässiga diskussioner. Du är skicklig på att presentera på både svenska och engelska, och du trivs i situationer där du förklarar komplexa koncept på ett tydligt och övertygande sätt.


Du kommer att arbeta nära våra kundteam, partners och olika funktioner inom både Conoa och Proact. Tillsammans tar vi fram de bästa möjliga tjänsterna och lösningarna för våra kunder.


Resor i Norden ingår som en del av tjänsten, cirka 20–30 dagar per år.


**Kvalifikationer**

* Du har relevant teknisk kompetens inom Container, Cloud Native, Open Source och IT-infrastruktur.
* Erfarenhet av nätverk, säkerhet och arkitektroller är meriterande.
* Tidigare erfarenhet från arbete i de nordiska länderna är en fördel.
* Du är nyfiken på ny teknik och har ett starkt driv att ständigt utvecklas och lära dig mer.
* Erfarenhet av att hålla presentationer och utbildningar.
* Du talar och skriver flytande svenska och engelska.

**Vad vi erbjuder**


Om du är redo för en spännande utmaning och vill arbeta i ett av Sveriges ledande konsultbolag inom Kubernetes så har vi mycket att erbjuda. Här får du arbeta i teknikens framkant med utmaningar och projekt i moderna IT-miljöer där skalbarhet, säkerhet och automatisering är prioriterat. Du är en del av ett fantastiskt gäng med en varm och familjär kultur.


På Conoa finns ett erfaret team med konsulter, säljare, presale och konsultchefer, som genom moderna arbetssätt och rätt nätverk utvecklas tillsammans. Du kommer att arbeta i uppdrag där du utmanas och får använda din kompetens på bästa sätt.


**Om** **Conoa**

Conoa grundades 2012 med en stark övertygelse om att Linux och Open Source-baserade lösningar är grundbultar i modern infrastruktur. Vårt mål var att bygga ett starkt teknikfokuserat företag med en företagskultur som främjar kompetensutveckling för att ständigt vara relevanta och hjälpa företag in i nya IT-miljöer.


2015 inleddes vår satsning inom Container-teknologi då vi blev första partner i Europa till Docker. Resan fortsatte med viktiga roller i stora kundprojekt, och att vi som första bolag i Sverige utsågs till både Kubernetes Certified Service Provider (KCSP) och Kubernetes Training Partner (KTP). Under dessa år har vi växt fram som en av Sveriges främsta specialister inom Kubernetes, cloud native och container-teknologi.


Vi har förmånen att ha ett 30-tal av Sveriges främsta specialister som medarbetare och vi hjälper några av Sveriges ledande företag att implementera modern Cloud Native infrastruktur.


Sedan april 2021 är vi en del av Proact. Genom samgåendet får vi ännu större möjlighet att utvecklas som specialister, samt att bredda våra tjänster och geografiska närvaro.


**Vi är på en spännande tillväxtresa!** **Vill du vara med?**


**Hör av dig!**

title: Senior Uppdragsledare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Jobbeskrivning**  

Du behöver arbeta med agil projektledning/uppdragsledning som handlar om att driva uppdrag på ett effektivare sätt och vara beredd på snabba förändringar, genom att låta arbetet leverera i korta iterationer och leverera en del i taget. Du behöver skapa en fungerande plan som kan ta höjd för en förändringsbenägen miljö, och skapa en transparens i arbetet.


Din viktigaste uppgift som uppdragsledare är att på ett engagerat och strukturerat sätt leda kollegor mot uppsatta mål. Du ska ha förmågan att hålla ett högt tempo och vara beredda på snabba prioriteringar.

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**

  

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av att leda omfattande projekt/uppdrag och förstudier i stora och komplexa organisationer.
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av verksamhets- och processutvecklingsarbete i stora och komplexa organisationer. Det innebär att arbete tidigare utförts inom organisationer som har ett djup med flera organisatoriska nivåer och en komplexitet som innebär att det finns flera beroenden från andra uppdrag som påverkar det egna projektet/uppdraget/delprojektet/deluppdraget.
* Kunskap om och erfarenheter av hur statliga myndigheter eller offentlig förvaltning är organiserade och styrs.
* Erfarenhet av projektledning/uppdragsledning som genomförts med ett agilt arbetssätt.
* Stor förmåga att driva sitt arbete självständigt.
* Besitter ett strategiskt perspektiv, se helheten och ha ett stort lösningsfokus.
* Stor erfarenhet av att driva förändringsledningsuppdrag. Det innebär att leda, driva och organisera förändringsarbetet och stötta.
* God kommunikativ förmåga och förmåga att samordna sitt arbete med intressenter för sitt projekt/uppdrag.
* God förmåga att uttrycka sig på svenska i tal och skrift.

  

  

**Meriterande**  

* Erfarenhet av att använda sig av Microsoft Azure DevOps Server (ADS) eller Team Foundation Server (TFS).
* Erfarenhet av att leda projekt inom säkerhetskänslig verksamhet.

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 23-01-2025  

  

**Om Deploja**  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?  


Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Data Architect konsult till bolag i Stockholm
description:
Teamet för Data & Analytics inom vår kunds IT-avdelning i Sverige arbetar med att bygga ett Data Lakehouse för att möta PwC:s behov av analys. De har definierat både mål- och lösningsarkitekturen och söker nu förstärka teamet för att öka antalet datarör (Data Pipelines) som kan levereras det kommande året.


Vi söker en Dataarkitekt med minst 5 års erfarenhet som Data Engineer eller Dataarkitekt. Helst bör du också ha erfarenhet av att implementera en ny Data Lakehouse-lösning. Eftersom en lösningsarkitekt redan finns i teamet och har det övergripande ansvaret för design av den nya dataplattformen, vill vi att Dataarkitekten ska bidra med sin tidigare erfarenhet av att utveckla Data Lakehouse-lösningar. Det inkluderar best practices-dokumentation, lärdomar från tidigare projekt, implementering av Proof of Concepts, med mera.

**Arbetsuppgifter**  

I din roll kommer du att skapa datamodeller och utveckla Proof of Concepts (PoC) inom följande områden:

* Dela data (Data Sharing)
* Datatillgång och åtkomstkontroller
* Data-lager i ett Data Lake
* Data Pipelines
* Dataintegrationer
* Data-kataloger

**För att lyckas i rollen bör du ha:**

* Erfarenhet av tekniska roller inom moln- och datamiljöer.
* Omfattande praktisk erfarenhet av att implementera datadrivna lösningar med Azure och big data-teknologier.
* Djup kunskap om större big data-lösningar, inklusive Databricks, Synapse Analytics, Azure Event Hub och Delta Lake.
* Färdigheter i datamodellering, ETL-processer och koncept för Data Lakehouse.
* Bekantskap med Azure DevOps och verktyg för Infrastructure as Code (IaC), som Terraform.
* God förståelse för datahantering, säkerhet, efterlevnad och integritetsregler

  

Urval sker löpande, vänta inte med din ansökan!

title: System Designer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**  

Our department as a whole works in many different areas, from feature development, SW architectural design, and software build tools to CI pipelines and system analysis. The teams work in an agile manner with great independence, ownership, and trust. We have a warm and relaxed atmosphere where you will be an important contributor.  

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**  

* You have a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent. You are self-going with at least 5 years of experience in software development.
  

* The skills and experience to reason about medium/large scale software systems
* Full stack development
* Solid communication skills.
* Proficiency in Python, SQL, Java

  

**Meritorious**

  

* Experience in embedded systems
* Worked in Configuration Management
* Proficiency in modern C++ and YAML experience
* Experience in the automotive industry
* Knowledge in Functional Safety and Cyber Security

  

  

  

**Application deadline:** 28-01-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  


  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Data Scientist, Internship, Sweden - BCG X
description:
Who We Are


Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we help clients with total transformation-inspiring complex change, enabling organizations to grow, building competitive advantage, and driving bottom-line impact.  

  

To succeed, organizations must blend digital and human capabilities. Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives to spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting along with technology and design, corporate and digital ventures—and business purpose. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, generating results that allow our clients to thrive.

 **We Are BCG X**

  

We’re a diverse team of more than 3,000 tech experts united by a drive to make a difference. Working across industries and disciplines, we combine our experience and expertise to tackle the biggest challenges faced by society today. We go beyond what was once thought possible, creating new and innovative solutions to the world’s most complex problems. Leveraging BCG’s global network and partnerships with leading organizations, BCG X provides a stable ecosystem for talent to build game-changing businesses, products, and services from the ground up, all while growing their career. Together, we strive to create solutions that will positively impact the lives of millions.

  

What You'll Do


Our BCG X teams own the full analytics value-chain end to end: framing new business challenges, designing innovative algorithms, implementing, and deploying scalable solutions, and enabling colleagues and clients to fully embrace AI. Our product offerings span from fully custom-builds to industry specific leading edge AI software solutions.

You'll be part of our rapidly growing team who will have a chance to apply data science methods and analytics to real-world business situations across a variety of industries to drive significant business impact. You'll have the chance to partner with clients in a variety of BCG regions and industries, and on key topics like climate change, enabling them to design, build, and deploy new and innovative solutions.

Additional responsibilities will include developing and delivering thought leadership in scientific communities and papers as well as leading conferences on behalf of BCG X. Successful candidates are intellectually curious builders who are biased toward action, creative, and communicative.

We are looking for dedicated individuals with a passion for data science, statistics, operations research and redefining organizations into AI led innovative companies. Successful candidates possess the following:* Comfortable in a client-facing role with the ambition to lead teams
* Likes to distill complex results or processes into simple, clear visualizations
* Explain sophisticated data science concepts in an understandable manner
* Love building things and are comfortable working with modern development tools and writing code collaboratively (bonus points if you have a software development or DevOps experience)
* Significant experience applying advanced analytics to business situations and a proven ability to synthesize complex data
* Deep understanding of modern machine learning techniques and their mathematical underpinnings, and can translate this into business implications for our clients
* Have strong project management skills

  

What You'll Bring

**REQUIREMENTS:**

Currently enrolled in a university master’s or PhD degree program in Computer Research Science, Data Science, Statistics, Operations Research, or related field
**TECHNOLOGIES:**

Programming Languages: Python  

#LI-DNI

  

#BCGXjob

  

Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.
  

BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

title: Software Test Automation Engineer
description:
About Edixen
  
Edixen Solutions is a homegrown Swedish IT software consultancy where innovation and digital excellence converge and local insight into every project. Born and bred in Sweden, our mission is to seamlessly guide businesses through digital transformations, leaving an indelible mark on the ever-evolving landscape. More than just consultants, Edixen is a collective of digital architects deeply rooted in Scandinavian culture. At Edixen, we believe in pushing boundaries and fostering a culture of continuous learning and growth.
  
  

**About the Role:**  

We are seeking a skilled Test Automation Engineer to design and implement test strategies that ensure the delivery of high-quality software solutions. If you have a passion for innovation, a knack for troubleshooting, and expertise in building automation frameworks, we’d love to have you on our dynamic and collaborative team.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

Develop, maintain, and execute automated test scripts using tools such as Selenium, Cypress, or Playwright.
  
Work closely with development teams during the SDLC to integrate testing strategies into build pipelines.
  
Design and implement end-to-end test automation frameworks while maintaining reusable test components.
  
Identify, document, and track bugs using tools like JIRA, ensuring they are resolved and retested.
  
Collaborate with QA, development, and product teams to define test cases for functional, performance, and regression testing.
  
Work with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitHub Actions) to ensure continuous delivery and deployment process quality.
  
Perform API testing using tools like Postman or Rest Assured, ensuring endpoints meet specifications.
  
Monitor and improve test coverage while optimizing for speed and efficiency.
  
Investigate test failures and perform root cause analysis to improve product robustness.
  
  

**What We’re Looking For:**  

Proven experience as a Test Automation Engineer or equivalent QA role.
  
Proficiency with test automation frameworks, such as Selenium, Cypress, or TestNG.
  
Strong skills in programming languages like Python, Java, or JavaScript for test script development.
  
Experience with performance testing tools, such as JMeter or LoadRunner.
  
Background in API testing and knowledge of tools like Postman, SoapUI, or Rest Assured.
  
Familiarity with version control systems such as Git and build automation tools like Maven or Gradle.
  
Familiarity with DevOps practices and integration of automated testing into CI/CD workflows.
  
Comfortable working with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) and containerized environments (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
  
Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
  
  

**Preferred Qualifications:**  

3-5+ years of experience in QA and test automation.
  
Experience with BDD frameworks like Cucumber or SpecFlow for behavior-driven development.
  
Familiarity with AI/ML-driven testing tools or AI utilization in testing processes.
  
Hands-on experience testing database-heavy applications with SQL or NoSQL validation scripts.
  
Exposure to testing in regulated industries or high-compliance environments (e.g., healthcare, finance).
  
  

**What We Offer:**  

Competitive salary with flexible working options (remote or on-site).
  
A culture that values innovation and provides access to cutting-edge testing tools.
  
Opportunities for certifications and training in testing technologies.
  
Collaboration with a talented and diverse team in an evolving tech environment.
  
Work-life balance initiatives and a supportive ecosystem for growth.
  
  

**How to Apply:**  

If you are enthusiastic about contributing to innovative projects and thrive in a dynamic team environment, we invite you to apply! Please submit your resume, a link to your portfolio or relevant projects, and a brief cover letter outlining your experiences and interest in the role to jobs@edixen.com
  
Edixen is a consultancy firm with a strong presence in Sweden, and Denmark. Connecting talented individuals like you with job opportunities in Sweden, Denmark, and other EU countries. Join our network and take the next step in your career. Let Edixen Solutions be your guide to unlocking exciting tech roles that match your skills and aspirations.

title: ALTEN Stockholm söker DevOps-ingenjörer
description:
**Är du en skicklig DevOps-ingenjör med passion för molnteknologi? Ta nästa steg i din karriär hos ALTEN!** 




  





**Vi söker talangfulla DevOps-ingenjörer till vårt team i Stockholm** 




 Vill du arbeta med modern teknologi och bidra till en hållbar framtid? Hos oss på ALTEN får du möjlighet att vara en del av en dynamisk, innovativ och internationell miljö tillsammans med kunniga och stöttande kollegor. Låter det intressant? Ansök idag!
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Som DevOps-ingenjör hos oss kommer du att:
 


* Vara en del av vårt fantastiska internationella konsultteam med expertis inom IT.
* Arbeta med varierande uppgifter i både nationella och internationella projekt hos våra världsledande kunder.
* Använda din kommunikativa och lyhörda natur för att främja gott samarbete.
* Dra nytta av din bakgrund inom utveckling och din passion för DevOps.
* Möjligtvis agera som teknisk konsult eller rådgivare.



  





**Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av:** 



* Minst 3 års praktisk erfarenhet av DevOps
* Programmeringsspråk som Python, GoLang eller Bash
* Molnplattformar som AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud Platform
* CI/CD-processer
* Containerteknologier som Docker eller Kubernetes
* Verktyg som Git, Jenkins eller Gerrit
* Atlassian-produkter



  





**Meriterande är:** 



* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i agila miljöer
* Svenska språkkunskaper



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 




 På ALTEN värdesätter vi varje individ i byggandet av morgondagens värld. Vi stödjer våra kunders projekt och ger våra medarbetare möjlighet att nå sin fulla potential genom att erbjuda:
 



  




* **Tekniska utmaningar** 
 och meningsfulla möjligheter
* En
 **inspirerande gemenskap** 
 och chansen att bidra till en hållbar framtid
* **Coachande ledarskap** 
 där våra ledare vägleder dig i rätt riktning
* **Personligt anpassade utbildningsmöjligheter** 
 via din individuella utbildningsbudget, användbar på vår interna ALTEN Academy eller externa kurser



  





**Om ALTEN** 




 ALTEN är ett av Europas största teknik- och IT-konsultföretag med över 57 000 anställda cirka 30 länder. Våra ingenjörer utför komplexa och mycket tekniska projekt genom hela produktutvecklingskedjan hos de främsta företagen inom flera olika branscher såsom Fordon, Försvar & Säkerhet, Energi, Industriell utrustning, Public service samt Life sciences. I Sverige är vi cirka 1300 engagerade medarbetare med 9 kontor i 9 städer - från Lund i söder till Skellefteå i norr.
 



  





 ALTEN har för femte året i rad utsetts till en av Sveriges mest attraktiva arbetsgivare av Karriärföretagen, en utmärkelse för arbetsgivare som erbjuder unika karriär- och utvecklingsmöjligheter.

title: Senior DevOps/Cloud Engineer (Azure)
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Software Development
description:
**Senior DevOps/Cloud Engineer (Azure) - Hybrid - Full Time - Product** 




  





 Do you want to build cutting-edge products in an environment where you are truly valued and can see the results of your work?
 



  





 My Client is seeking a Senior DevOps/Cloud Engineer who is passionate about technical transformation, automation and making things happen.
 



  





 You'll have the opportunity to combine your skills in Coding, Engineering and Architecture to help shape the future technical direction of their cutting-edge and market leading product which facilitates over 35 million transactions per year.
 



  





 You'll have a high level of autonomy whilst also being part of a super collaborative environment which encompasses how people and technology can come together to achieve great things.
 



  





 To be successful in the role, you'll have experience with:
 



 <> Azure
 



 <> CI/CD (Preferably Azure DevOps)
 



 <> Powershell and/or C#
 



  





 Experience with Architecture is desirable but not essential
 



  





 Benefits Offered:
 



 <> 30 days holiday
 



 <> ITP1 Pension
 



 <> Education allowance
 



 <> Wellness allowance
 



 <> Free team lunches and breakfasts
 



  





 Salary range is paying 50k-70k SEK/per month.
 



  





 Unfortunately this opportunity cannot offer any form of VISA sponsorship.
 



  





 If you think this could be a good fit for you then don't hesitate to get in touch!
 



  





 📧 james.mayhew@parallelconsulting.com
 



 📞 +46 31 363 28 81

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Är du en erfaren DevOps-ingenjör med intresse för teknik och att ständigt utvecklas? Vill du hjälpa våra kunder att göra världen lite bättre? Då kan du vara den vi söker.
   

  

 HiQ är utan tvekan ett av Sveriges mest tekniktunga och spännande konsultbolag med kunder inom en rad olika branscher såsom exempelvis fordon, fintech, myndigheter, medtech och telekom. Förutom att vi bidragit till utvecklingen av att snart bli ett kontantlöst samhälle, utvecklar vi även allt från digitaliseringen av elkraftsystem till framtidens autonoma fordon. Enkelt sagt, vi gillar att skapa sådant som förenklar och gör vardagen lite roligare för oss alla.
   

  

 Rollen som DevOps-ingenjör hos oss är en omväxlande roll, med arbete på olika nivåer, där du får en chans att delta i våra kunders DevOps-resa utifrån deras mognadsgrad.
   

  

**Matchar vi?**
 Vi söker dig som blir uttråkad av att göra samma sak två gånger och genast börjar hacka ihop en automatiserad lösning istället. Vi ser gärna att du har automatiserat något som absolut inte behövdes automatiseras! Kanske hemma?
   

  

 De som jobbar med DevOps på HiQ har ofta en kodtung utbildning och har jobbat som DevOps engineer i några år. Vi ser gärna att du har en liknande bakgrund, då vi oftast tar oss an Stockholms mer avancerade uppdrag.
   

  

**Checklist**
* Högskole-/Universitetsexamen inom datateknik, datavetenskap, systemvetenskap eller annan relevant inriktning
* Minst 3 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet
* Flytande i svenska och engelska


 Det är ett stort plus om du har tidigare erfarenhet av:
   

  

* Scripting
* Säkerhet
* Monitorering
* CI/CD-tekniker
* Containeriseringsverktyg och molnlösningar
* Automation i produktionsmiljö med många noder
* IP-nätverk, VPN, DNS, lastbalanserare och brandväggar
* Seamless/automatiserade byggscript för release management i olika miljöer


 Vi ser också gärna att du tidigare byggt sofistikerad infrastruktur med en hög grad av automation och är en förespråkare av infrastructure-as-code.

title: DevOps Engineer - Infrastructure and Automation
description:
We build a platform for controlling & monitoring self-driving vehicles
   

  

 Scania is currently undergoing an exciting transformation from a traditional truck manufacturer to a provider of complete sustainable transport solutions. Autonomous Transport is a crucial part of this transformation as Scania’s success depends on flexible and efficient solutions that support current and future business requirements.
   

  

 Intelligent Transport Systems is a section at Scania Research & Development. We are contributing to Autonomous Transport Solutions by providing cloud-based systems (AWS) for automated, optimized, and safe vehicle control and monitoring, all built into one platform.
   

  

 We need a Platform & DevOps Engineer
   

  

 Our Development Platform team is growing. Help us build the infrastructure that powers our off-board software (technology outside of the actual vehicle). In this role, you'll be instrumental in building and managing cloud-based systems for our autonomous vehicle platform using AWS.
   

  

 Your mission
   

  

  

* Design, develop, and deploy scalable and reliable applications using Kubernetes, AWS, Cilium, GitLab CI/CD, Crossplane, IAM, and Infrastructure as Code (IaC).
* Collaborate with various teams to ensure successful technology implementation and integration.
* Participate in all phases of software development, from conception to maintenance.
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues, focusing on performance and reliability.


 Who you are
   

  

 As a person you’re a team player, you like to share your knowledge and expertise. You are self-managing, curious, dare to try, and are motivated by changes.
   

  

 You need to have a sense of order, analytical ability, and be safety conscious.
   

  

 You enjoy working in a team, have good collaboration skills, and work constantly to improve and optimize how and what we do. You also have a deep interest in platform technology, software development, automation, and DevSecOps.
   

  

 You'll need
   

  

  

* Proficiency in Kubernetes, AWS, CI/CD, and IaC.
* Degree in Computer Science or related field preferred.
* Merit if you have experience working with Keycloak and other IAM solutions


 It is beneficial if you are familiar with our tech stack: Terraform, Terragrunt, IAM, Karpenter, Crossplane, DynamoDB, Grafana, Tempo, Loki, Prometheus, OpenTelemetry, ArgoCD, GitLab pipelines, Python, Bash, Go, Apache Kafka, Cilium, Redis.
   

  

 Who am I as your manager?
   

  

 I am here to support our team in being successful, and happy, and working on the things that are most important to help our customers, improve our product, and improve our business. I am also here to engage, retain, and grow world-class talents (That is you!). I have a curious mind and like to know why we do the things we do.
   

  

 I value Trust, Transparency, Collaboration, and Courage. If you are curious about me I encourage you to check my LinkedIn profile.
   

  

 Our offer
   

  

 We offer a healthy and inspiring workplace, with respect for the individual, where you have great opportunities to shape your work and your future. Your personal and professional development is important and something we encourage and support.
   

  

 We believe in modern leadership thinking and an agile way of working, and we think you will fit perfectly into that mindset. We work from home and at the office in Södertälje, So with some planning, you will find a good work/life balance.
   

  

 Looking forward to hearing from you, feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions.
   

  

 Your future manager,
   

  

 Göran Henrixon, Head of Platform, +46-8-553 70758
   

  

 Application
   

  

 If you are interested and feel that you have a fair share of what is mentioned above, please apply!
   

  

 Selections and interviews will take place on an ongoing basis throughout the application period. Please apply no later than 2025-02-04.
   

  

 Your application should include a CV and degree certificate. Instead of a cover letter, please answer the questions stated when you submit your application. A background check might be conducted for this position.

title: Senior Solution Owner
job_function: Product Management, Information Technology, and Project Management
description:
We are seeking a dedicated and experienced Solution Owner to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for the vision, strategy, and roadmap of our product. You will work closely with cross-functional teams (engineering, design, marketing) to deliver high-quality products that meet our customers’ needs.
 



  





**WHAT YOU'LL DO** 



* Create and maintain product backlogs, including user stories, acceptance criteria, and release plans.
* Collaborate with the development team to ensure that product features are delivered on time, within budget, and to the desired quality standards.
* Analyze product performance data to identify areas for improvement.
* Communicate effectively with stakeholders, including senior management, customers, and partners.



  





**WHO YOU ARE** 



* Extensive experience working as a Product Owner or in a similar role.
* Proven experience in agile development methodologies (e.g., Scrum, Kanban).
* Excellent communication, collaboration, and presentation skills in English and Swedish (Swedish is for internal discussions).
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Experience with multitenant B2B software architecture.
* High technical proficiency in enterprise-grade solutions (Authentication, Authorization, Databases, APIs, etc.).



  





**Bonus points for** 



* Understanding of accounting and financial close processes.
* Experience with ERP integrations.
* Experience with Jira and Confluence, Azure, Azure DevOps.



  









 At our core, Trintechers stand committed to fostering a culture rooted in our core values – Humble, Empowered, Reliable, and Open. Together, these values guide our actions, define our identity, and inspire us to continuously strive for excellence in everything we do.
 



  





 Should you require (or need) accommodations throughout any stage of the recruitment process, please provide your requirements to recruiting@trintech.com and we will work with you to accommodate your needs.
 



  





 All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.

title: DevOps Engineer / Cloud Specialist
description:
*Vi söker nu en erfaren och driven DevOps Engineer till vårt nya team med ansvar för Länsförsäkringars gemensamma ”Cloud Data & Analytics Platform”. Teamet ansvarar och utvecklar vår Azure-baserad dataanalysplattform. Tycker du om att jobba med molnlösningar samt automatisering och vill vara med och påverka, då kan det här vara din nästa möjlighet!*
**Om jobbet**
 Som DevOps Engineer hos oss kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att utveckla och optimera vår Azure-baserade dataanalysplattform.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifter och ansvarsområden:
   

  

* Samarbeta med utvecklingsteam och andra intressenter för att förstå deras behov och krav, och säkerställa att plattformen uppfyller dessa.
* Designa, implementera och underhålla CI/CD-pipelines för att säkerställa smidiga och effektiva bygg-, test- och distributionsprocesser.
* Bygga Infrastruktur med hjälp av Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
* Övervaka och optimera plattformens prestanda, tillgänglighet och säkerhet.
* Konsultera och stötta olika utvecklingsteam i deras respektive molnresa.
* Delta i incidenthantering och felsökning.


 Vårt huvudsakliga uppdrag är att tillhandahålla en robust och skalbar dataanalysplattform som möjliggör för våra användare att dra nytta av data på ett effektivt och insiktsfullt sätt. Vi är experterna som säkerställer att plattformen inte bara uppfyller dagens behov, utan också är förberedd för framtidens utmaningar och möjligheter.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Du har ett intresse för att utveckla dig själv och gillar att jobba i team med helhetsansvar. Du har erfarenhet av och förståelse för storskaliga molnmiljöer samt enterprise-scale och landing zones. Du har arbetat med att etablera eller utveckla molnbaserade dataplattformar.
   

  

 För att bli framgångsrik i denna roll önskar vi att du har följande:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av Azure-molninfrastruktur och lösningar.
* Förståelse för nätverk, säkerhet och databasadministration i molnmiljöer.
* Erfarenhet av att sätta upp ”self-service platforms”.
* Kunskap i scriptspråk som PowerShell och Bash.
* Relevant utbildning.
* Goda språkkunskaper i svenska, både tal och skrift.


 Meriterande:
   

  

* Erfarenhet inom bank eller försäkringssektorn.
* Kunskap inom SQL, C# och .NET.
* Relevanta certifieringar inom molnteknologier.
* Erfarenhet av data engineering och ETL-processer.
* Kännedom om Microsofts ramverk “Cloud Scale Analytics”.


**Om oss**
 Välkommen till Länsförsäkringar och vårt nyetablerade Cloud Data & Analytics Platform-team!
   

  

 Vi är en grupp passionerade och kunniga individer som arbetar tillsammans för att skapa och underhålla vår nya dataanalysplattform. Vårt team består idag av en Product Owner, en Solution Architect och DevOps Engineers, alla med en gemensam vision att leverera högkvalitativa lösningar och expertis inom dataanalys.
   

  

 På Länsförsäkringar är vi mitt i en spännande resa mot molnbaserade lösningar, och dataanalys spelar en central roll i denna förflyttning. Vårt team har stora möjligheter att påverka både sina egna roller och hur vi arbetar tillsammans. Vi värdesätter innovation, samarbete och kontinuerlig förbättring, och vi strävar alltid efter att ligga i framkant av teknologiska framsteg.
   

  

 Vi är stolta över vårt arbete och de framsteg vi gör, och vi ser fram emot att fortsätta vår resa mot att bli ledande inom molnbaserad dataanalys.
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-01-22**

title: Test Automation Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
 Build and develop automated test applications and pipelines for payment systems
   

  

 Maintain and support existing test automation solutions
   

  

 Understand and review requirements for payment products
   

  

 Understand test scenarios and expected outcomes, fail/success scenarios etc
   

  

 Take part in and understand tracking and documentation of issues (not fixing issues)
   

  

 Understand system documentation and architect descriptions
   

  

 Experience from the finance area, such as banking, payments or insurance is a plus
   

  

 Experience from file based payments, clearing and settlements applications or similar is a plus
   

  

 Background from a major programming language e.g. C# or Java could be helpful
   

  

**Application deadline:** 
 27-01-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Security Engineer
description:
* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
* Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
* Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
* Be a productive member of the team.


**Requirements**
* Evaluate the organization's current cloud security posture across AWS, Azure, and GCP.
* Identify security gaps and vulnerabilities, and recommend mitigation strategies.
* Implement security best practices for workloads, services, and data across cloud environments.
* Interpret and apply compliance frameworks such as GDPR, HIPAA, and NIS2.
* Translate compliance requirements into actionable security measures.
* Ensure cloud environments adhere to internal and external audit standards.
* Design and implement cloud-native security solutions across multiple hyperscalers.
* Embed security into CI/CD pipelines to uphold DevSecOps practices.
* Create architecture diagrams and detailed security blueprints.
* Deploy cloud-native monitoring tools and establish alerting mechanisms.
* Define and maintain incident response plans, assisting in security incident management.
* Ensure logging and monitoring solutions provide comprehensive visibility across all clouds.
* Partner with development, operations, and compliance teams to align on security needs.
* Maintain thorough documentation of security policies, procedures, and controls.
* Generate regular reports on security posture, risks, and remediation efforts.
* In-depth knowledge of AWS, Azure, and GCP security features and best practices.
* Experience aligning cloud environments with compliance requirements like GDPR, HIPAA, and NIS2.
* Proficiency in designing and implementing security solutions for cloud-native architectures.
* Hands-on expertise with CI/CD integration and DevSecOps practices.
* Strong skills in monitoring, incident response, and stakeholder collaboration.


**Benefits**
* A challenging, innovating environment.
* Opportunities for learning where needed.

title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
description:
At Viaplay Group, we entertain millions of people every day through our streaming services, radio networks, and TV channels. We believe in the power of content not just as a way of telling stories and touching lives, but also expanding worlds.
   

  

 We’re looking for the best people to join us on our journey. Right now, we’re searching for a
 **Senior Site Reliability Engineer** 
 in our
 **Stockholm** 
 office – are you ready to hit play on an exciting career change?
   

  

**The role**
 As a Senior Site Reliability Engineer, you will be a key contributor to our core infrastructure. This by ensuring that we retain stable, up-to-date, and modern systems to serve Viaplay Group’s numerous services ranging from internal development to customer-facing streaming.
   

  

 You will be joining the Content Infrastructure team that is responsible for large parts of Viaplay Group’s core infrastructure. The team works with these pillars of infrastructure – Compute, Network, Storage, and Security – in a hybrid cloud environment. We encourage a culture of open communication and information sharing to achieve efficiency in not having to solve the same problems twice.
   

  

**Some Of Your Daily Tasks Will Include**
* Provide private cloud services through multiple virtualization technologies.
* Manage multi-petabyte storage for several departments
* Build and manage the streaming platform where all Viaplay Sports and streaming TV channels originate


 We operate on a rotating 24/7 on-call schedule, with one week of on-call duties every 5 to 6 weeks.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For**
 We are searching for someone who is goal-oriented, analytical, service-conscious, and accurate with quality as peer. With your experiences, we believe you could contribute to the team with latest updates in the field and drive change in the domain.
   

  

**In order to thrive in this role, we do believe you’ll have at least some experience in the following:**
* Working with various Linux distributions
* Proficiency in scripting, most preferably Python
* Working in modern datacenter layer 2 and layer 3 networking
* Automation and configuration management tools – Salt, Ansible, etc.
* Managing distributed storage systems


**It’s a bonus if you have:** 
  

  

* Docker and Kubernetes management experience
* BGP routing experience in multi homed environments
* Spectrum Scale management experience
* Proficiency in network security and auditing services


 What we offer you
   

  

* We’ve got you covered! 30 days of paid vacation every year, an attractive pension and insurance scheme, and generous parental leave pay lift.
* Your wellbeing matters. We provide you with various wellbeing initiatives including wellness allowance.
* A safe space to grow and up-skill. Our learning culture puts you in the driver’s seat of your own development.
* An innovative environment with Hack Days once a year. This week-long initiative allows you to think outside the box and deliver creative, technical solutions that (more often than not) go on to be implemented, either in our product or our ways of working.
* Entertainment is what we love, and entertainment is what we do. So, unlimited access to Viaplay seems only fair for you to get to know the product – including serier & viewing events, new release movie rentals, linear channels and more.


**Hit play** 
**today**
 If this feels like your kind of challenge, make sure you apply by attaching your CV here – you may also want to add your LinkedIn profile. Please don’t send us your application via email because we won’t be able to accept it. We do, however, welcome any questions you may have about this particular position.
   

  

 Want to learn more about who we are and what we do? Check out our careers page or follow us on Instagram! We’re only ever a few clicks away.

title: Konsult inom IT-transformation med erfarenhet inom affärsutveckling
job_function: Project Management, Business Development, and Information Technology
company_industry: Business Consulting and Services, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Technology, Information and Media
description:
**Vill du ta dig an komplexa uppdrag och samtidigt vara en del av Midagons framtida utveckling?** 




  





 Midagon är en nordisk, oberoende verksamhets- och IT-konsultfirma specialiserad på att utmana transformationsprojekt och program. Vi är över 200 anställda i Norden, varav närmare 100 befinner sig i Sverige. Vi driver uppdrag i både privat och offentlig sektor, åt stora globala aktörer såväl som nationella företag. Våra uppdrag varierar i storlek, men gemensamt är att vi hjälper våra kunder att lyckas med sina komplexa transformationer.
 



  





 Våra erfarna konsulter har en bakgrund inom bland annat projektledning, verksamhetsutveckling eller specialkompetens inom specifika ämnesområden. Hos oss hittar du de bästa av de bästa. Ett ypperligt kvitto är våra utmärkelser som DI Gasellföretag, Sveriges nöjdaste kunder (Radar), certifierade av ”Great place to work” samt Superföretag av Veckans affärer.
 



  





 Vill du också vara del av ett team av seniora experter, där avslappnad atmosfär går hand i hand med ett engagerat arbete och sund livsbalans?
 



  





**Rollen** 




 Vi letar nu efter en affärsdriven och senior projekt- och programledare inom IT-transformationsområdet som också vill vara med och utveckla bolaget inom sitt ämnesområde.
 



  





 I rollen arbetar du tillsammans med kunden i deras spännande transformations- och förändringsprojekt från analys, implementering till överlämning. Du kommer även att arbeta tätt tillsammans med våra Business Area Managers och vårt säljteam i frågor som berör IT-transformation. Detta i syfte att framtidssäkra vårt erbjudande kopplat till försäljning, kompetensutveckling och affärsutveckling.
 



  





 För att trivas hos oss krävs i rollen en kombination av entusiasm, pragmatism samt ett metodiskt tillvägagångssätt. Både ledarskaps- och projektledningserfarenhet är avgörande, liksom färdigheter inom förändringsledning och affärsutveckling.
 



  





**För att bli framgångsrik i rollen bör du:** 




 Ha erfarenhet av att ha projektlett flertalet komplexa projekt och/eller program inom IT-transformationsområdet: upphandlingsprojekt, digitaliseringsprojekt och moderniseringsprojekt inom IT- och infrastruktur. Du ska även ha erfarenhet och vana att:
 



  





 · van att driva IT-relaterade projekt med ansvar för budget och rapportering till styrgrupp
 



 · arbetat systematiskt med olika typer av projektmodeller och arbetssätt (ex PPS, Prince2, SAFe, Agilt och/eller DevOps. Det är meriterande med certifieringar
 



 · van att genomföra utredningar och analyser, identifiera trender inom ditt ämnesområde
 



 · ha erfarenhet av att stötta vid försäljning i form av framtagande av affärsförslag och kundpresentationer/säljmöten
 



 · bidragit i affärsutveckling och brinner för aktivt nätverkande, med kund och marknad
 



 · ha minst 5 års erfarenhet som konsult
 



  





 I rollen kommer du vara en viktig spelare i att leda utvecklingen av Midagons erbjudanden och tjänster. Du ska heller inte vara främmande för att dela din erfarenhet och sakkunskap internt som externt. Meriterande är även om du arbetet inom olika industrier. Ett krav är att du kan kommunicera obehindrat på svenska och engelska.
 



  





**Är du nyfiken?** 




 Läs gärna mer på www.midagon.com där du också enkelt registrerar din ansökan. Har du ytterligare frågor eller funderingar, tveka inte att kontakta vår HR-ansvarig Hanna Fredriksson på hanna.fredriksson@midagon.com / 076-0074551 eller Martin Nilsson inom HR-& rekrytering på martin.nilsson@midagon.com / 070-2257833.
 



  





 Välkommen till oss!

title: Sales Developer
description:
**Accenture Sweden**
***Ambitious and eager to learn***
 Do you want to make great ideas happen for some of the world's most dynamic companies? With broad global resources and deep technical know-how, we collaborate with clients to cultivate ideas and deliver results. So, do you want to join
 **Accenture** 
 and enjoy an innovative environment where challenging and interesting work is part of daily life? Then this might be your next step.
   

  

 Accenture is a global management consulting, technology services and outsourcing company with close to 800,000 employees. We are currently looking for a
 **Junior Sales profile** 
 for the strategic sales team that is comprised of sales professionals focused on generating potential opportunities and on contracting work with clients across the Nordics.
   

  

**Job Description** 
 Your primary role will be to learn to drive growth by increasing the flow of prospective deals into the Sales Pipeline and/or learn to leading the qualified opportunities through all deal maturity phases to successful wins.
   

  

**Qualifications**
- Huge interest of selling/business development; aiming one day multiple million-dollar sales targets

- Preferably deep interest in the Utility/Energy/Natural Resources

- Ability to meet travel requirements, hen applicable

- A relevant mater’s degree

- You have probably been told that you have good sales and deal orchestration/leadership skills – and now you want them developed

- Excellent business acumen and industry acumen

- Interest in getting global expertise and perspective

- Exceptional communication in English (written and oral) and interpersonal skills

- Strong organizational, multi-tasking, time-management, and analytical skills

- Willing to thrive for getting excellent negotiation, influence, mediation, and conflict management skills

- Energetic, social, creative and competitive

**After a learning period** 
**your key responsibilities may include:**
- Identifying potential leads by positioning deep industry-based value propositions leveraging Accenture’s industry insight, assets, references, and campaigns

- Shape differentiated value propositions building on deep industry insight leveraging Accenture’s broad capability areas including technology operations, DevOps, digitalization, technology transformation, J2C, business process outsourcing, digital marketing operation, data/value led transformation and strategy advisory services

- Developing relationships with potential buyers through personal meetings, presentations, speaking engagements, business networking or other business or social gatherings

- Develop strategies and tactics for penetration of new accounts and cross selling to establish accounts

- Initiate and qualify opportunities that are acceptable to Accenture and has a justified business case for the client

- Recommending which opportunities Accenture should pursue using criteria such as highest probability of winning, and profit potential

- Supporting/participating in any oral proposal activities, developing, and reviewing written proposals

- Maintain a keen sense of marketplace intelligence of trends and competition to provide market leading perspectives, emerging trends, tools and techniques that can be effectively utilized to develop and promote business

- Articulate what Accenture brings: relevant assets and capabilities including Market Offerings; Vision; Process Framework; Key Messages; Credentials; Tools

- Track and communicate progress against sales goals and targets

**Investing in you** 
 At Accenture we believe that quality comes from within, and we invest considerable resources in the development of your professional competencies. You will receive on-going training and leadership development that builds and extends your skills on a continuous basis. The training takes place both in Sweden and at our various locations around the world.
   

  

**Balancing your priorities** 
 Our employees are our most important asset, and we provide an environment that encourages a healthy work/life balance. You will get your own career counselor (People Lead) who interacts with you on a regular basis, ensuring you a career path that suits your needs and ambitions. Through our buddy network you will have easy access to knowledge and networks both on a professional and a social level. By using laptops, mobile phones, internet access and technological innovation, you will furthermore benefit from our flexible working arrangements.
   

  

 Are you interested in developing your career opportunities in a world class environment? Submit your application and CV online today.
   

  

 Please submit your application in English by clicking the link below. If you have any questions regarding this position or if you want to find out how you can develop your career opportunities at Accenture in general, please contact recruitment; Annette Kleisdorff +45 29999041.

title: System Architect for Scania Workshop Suite
description:
Scania is now undergoing a transformation from being a supplier of trucks, buses and engines to a supplier of complete and sustainable transport solutions.
   

  

**What We Do**
 We at Vehicle Service Information (EYS) are passionate about Uptime and Serviceability. We enable our workshops to be best in class in supporting our customers when they come in for a workshop visit.
   

  

 Daily, 16,000 Technicians maintain, troubleshoot and repair Scania vehicles and engines worldwide.
   

  

 To make sure our workshops can deliver world class services, we develop the tool suite SWS, Scania Workshop Suite. It’s a microservice based cloud solution with a web frontend. It’s mainly written in C#, Angular and JS. SWS is hosted in AWS . SWS interacts with Scania’s inhouse developed PDM system and together with our digital twin data provide the information and services the workshops need to excel. The solution also make use of edge computing and vehicle communication hardware developed internally.
   

  

**Your Assignment**
 The development team consists of around 12 cross functional sub teams with a DevOps approach. As a System architect you will be the bridge between the teams and the enterprise and solution architects.
   

  

 You will be the chairman for the architecture community of practice and make sure that the services developed are possible to maintain and deliver the right performance. As the solution consists of multiple micro services, it’s important that the architecture and standardization make them work together. You act as a coach for the teams when they implement, but also work pre-emptive to make sure our architecture vision and technology align with the business goals.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 We are looking for someone who has great commitment to lead the system architecture development in our solution. You have a vision for the architecture, founded in theory and experience. You work as an informal leader to realize it, and you do that with respect for the individuals involved. You have a positive attitude and find it energizing to engage with many contact points. In your work, you will need extensive cross-functional collaboration where communication skills will be very important.
   

  

 We believe that you have a master’s degree in computer science and are fluent in both English and Swedish. We also believe that you have several years’ of experience developing cloud based solutions, preferably with an architect role. Experience from the automotive industry and embedded systems is meriting.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 A flexible work environment in a hybrid setup where we expect you to be at the office at least 3 days a week. A place to grow, learn and have fun while you do it.
   

  

 We can also offer other benefits such as free exercise at Scania’s own facility in Södertälje or wellness allowance, performance bonus, occupational pension, flexible working hours, lunch at reduced price, the opportunity for a staff car and much more.
   

  

**Further information**
 Selection will be done continuously
   

  

 For more information contact Patrik Rönnqvist, Head of Service Solution IT Coordination, +46855383174

title: Serverless Fullstack Engineer, Solna
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
At PostNord Group IT, we build the best digital customer solutions for the Nordic markets. Some examples are PostNord Customer Portal, Skicka Direkt, PostNord app and the Postcards app. Live tracking, parcel robots and digital postage are some of the latest services we have developed.
   

  

 With us, you are met by an open and warm work environment, here we are constantly working to learn and improve. Sharing and learning by mistake is an important part of our culture.
   

  

 We work agile in a DevOps culture. The teams are the backbone of our organization and are self-governing, which means great opportunities to influence technology choices and working methods.
   

  

 The team seeking your knowledge is the Pay to PostNord Team!
   

  

**The team**
 We, the Pay to PostNord Team, is responsible for PostNord Group´s digital payment solutions. These solutions are central to our growth. As a full-time developer with us you will be part of an agile team that has cutting-edge expertise in the area of payment solutions. We handle on average over 20 million transactions every year from satisfied customers from all over the Nordics.
   

  

 We are responsible for the payment solutions in their entirety - new development, product lifecycle management, solution architecture, monitoring and operation (DevOps). The ambition is to constantly be at the forefront of technology and together we help build innovative payment solutions for digital products within PostNord.
   

  

 Developers part of this team have the option to take lead on specific projects and act as a representative for the Pay to PostNord Team. The support of the team and the tech lead will always be very close if needed. This has been very appreciated by the team members.
   

  

**Some of our technologies/techniques**
* Microservices/Serverless
* Typescript/Javascript
* NodeJS
* AWS - Lambda, DynamoDB, SQS, S3 to name a few.
* REST
* React/Angular/Vue
* CSS
* Grafana


 ,
   

  

 We believe that you enjoy working in an agile environment where you get great opportunities to be involved and influence the work and the technical choices. You should also love to learn about new technologies/solutions and get acquainted with new contexts since this is part of our everyday life in the Pay to PostNord Team.
   

  

 As a person, you are committed, responsible and unpretentious. We believe that you have several years of experience as a developer and preferably experience of payment solutions, solution architecture and database development.
   

  

**Your profile**
* Backend development in NodeJS (Javascript or Typescript).
* AWS or similar cloud platforms (Azure, OpenStack or Google Cloud).
* Knowledge in at least one modern frontend framework (Angular, React or Vue).
* Academic education in computer science or equivalent experience.
* English or Swedish in speech and writing.


**We offer you**
* To work with our modern tech stack and you are given great opportunities to influence the choice of technology.
* We aim to have a great work-life balance and we have the support of our own System Operations Team that handles any incident outside of the developers working hours.
* We encourage you to develop. For example, we sponsor you to AWS certify.
* A job where the value you deliver is important to hundreds of thousands of users.
* Flexible hybrid workplace with an open working climate.
* Good insurance and occupational pension conditions.
* Wellness allowance and access to office gym and swimming pool.
* Employee benefits through PostNord's own employee foundation PostNord Plus.
* Employment according to a collective agreement.


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless if we lead our self or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at www.postnord.com.
   

  

**Apply**
 What are you waiting for? Welcome with your application. Selection is ongoing, so apply as soon as possible. If you have any questions about the position please send an email to petra.wahlund@postnord.com Note that we do not accept applications via email. We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Business governance specialist
description:
FNZ Markets is FNZ group’s internal Equity brokerage and custody provider. The team consists of 15 staff located in Stockholm, managing the operational flows on a pan-EU basis.
Role Description
The objective of Business governance role is to deliver, coordinate and continuously develop an effective governance structure for the business and legal entity, in which the business line operates. In order to ensure the business line’s adherence to policies and procedures, process documentation standards, as well as overseeing the business’ decision-making processes, which includes KPI management and escalations.
The role works alongside the managing directors of the business with the responsibility of ensuring full compliance with internal and external requirements around audit, governance and structure.
While FNZ is technology business, the role requires wider financial services industry and Nordic regional experience, ideally within a fast-paced regulated environment with exposure to multiple markets and functions.
The duties and responsibilities of this role will include the following:
General* Ensure that the business line follows all policies and procedures.
* Drafting and documenting process maps.
* Structure and coordination of management decision agendas.
* Representing the business in group wide forums around product and client approvals.
* Coordination for internal audit.
* ISAE 3402 coordination.
* Internal management around KPI and management reporting.
* Oversight function for outsourcing arrangements, which includes continuous oversight and monitoring.
* Key controls management.
* Work together with other functions within the group to align frameworks around process documentation and controls.


Required Knowledge & Skills* 5 years +of Industry experience from either a financial services form and/or the big 4 accounting/consultancy firms.
* Hands-on experience of business governance and/or business process mapping.
* Able to work independently and with initiative
* Strong written and verbal communication skills in English and a desire to work as part of a global team.
* Excellent organisational, administration and time management skills.


Opportunities* Right from day one, you will work alongside exceptional, multicultural teams - experts in their respective fields - who will inspire and challenge you to make your greatest impact.
* Be part of a highly successful, rapidly growing, global business that is leading the delivery of financial services via cloud computing and partners with some of the world’s largest companies;
* Working in a flexible and agile way that meets the needs of the business and personal circumstances;
* Remuneration, significant financial rewards and career advancement is based on individual contribution and business impact rather than tenure or seniority;
* We provide global career opportunities for our best employees at any of our offices in the UK, EU, US, Canada, South Africa and APAC.


Commitment to Equal Opportunities
At FNZ, we recognise that diversity, equity and inclusion are important factors contributing to our success. We embrace the unique perspective and capabilities of our current and future employees, which will help us continue to drive innovation and achieve our business goals. Recruitment decisions at FNZ are made in a non-discriminatory manner without regard to gender, ethnicity/race, faith, age, nationality, gender identity, sexual orientation, marital status, socio-economic background, disability or military veteran status where all applicants and employees are valued and respected.
In addition, we want to ensure accessibility needs are well supported, if you require specific support please advise us.
#LI-VP1*About FNZ**FNZ is committed to opening up wealth so that everyone, everywhere can invest in their future on their terms. We know the foundation to do that already exists in the wealth management industry, but complexity holds firms back.**We created wealth’s growth platform to help. We provide a global, end-to-end wealth management platform that integrates modern technology with business and investment operations. All in a regulated financial institution.**We partner with over 650 financial institutions and 12,000 wealth managers, with US$1.5 trillion in assets under administration (AUA).**Together with our customers, we help over 20 million people from all wealth segments to invest in their future.*
company_description: FNZ is the global platform opening up wealth.

title: Treasury Operations Specialist
description:
Team Description
FNZ Markets is FNZ group’s internal Equity brokerage and custody provider. The team consists of 15 staff located in Stockholm, managing the operational flows on a pan-EU basis.
Role Description
The objective of cash management team is to deliver, coordinate and continuously develop an effective cash management, treasury and collateral management function, that provides the tools to enable FNZ Markets to identify, assess, control and monitor cash related risks.
The Treasury operational role works in the 1st line operations team, with the handling of the daily processes. The wider operational function handles clearing & settlements, asset servicing and regulatory reporting.
While FNZ is technology business, the role requires wider financial services industry and Nordic regional experience, ideally within a fast-paced regulated environment with exposure to multiple markets and functions.
The duties and responsibilities of this role will include the following:
General* Act as subject matter expert within the FNZ Markets EU business line for cash management, FX, Collateral and treasury related topics.
* Responsibility for the daily operational tasks and controls.
* Defining key controls for operational processes to minimize operational risks. Documentation and reviews.
* Ensuring that the business line utilises its credit lines, liquidity and collateral in the most efficient way.
* Intraday and overnight credit and liquidity planning/monitoring.
* KPI and report generation.
* Reconciliation of accounts and balances.
* Alignment with group processes and controls for cash management, FX, collateral and treasury.
